12 namespace ackermann_ekf {
13 
14 SensorArray::SensorArray(ros::NodeHandle &nh, ros::NodeHandle &nh_private)
15  : tf_buffer_(new tf2_ros::Buffer),
16  tf_listener_(new tf2_ros::TransformListener(*tf_buffer_)),
17  tf_broadcaster_(new tf2_ros::TransformBroadcaster) {
18  ROS_INFO("Initializing Ackermann EKF...");
19 
20  nh_private.getParam("base_link", base_link_);
21  nh_private.getParam("world_frame", world_frame_);
22  nh_private.getParam("frequency", frequency_);
23  nh_private.getParam("differential_position", differential_position_);
24  nh_private.getParam("zero_z", zero_z_);
25 
26  // Default value of periodic_filter_time_delay is two update cycles
27  periodic_filter_time_delay_ = 2.0 / frequency_;
28  nh_private.getParam("periodic_filter_time_delay",
29  periodic_filter_time_delay_);
30 
31  if (!differential_position_) {
32  initial_position_.setZero();
33  // filter_initialized_ is true as soon as initial_position_ has been set
34  filter_initialized_ = true;
35  }
36 
37  Eigen::VectorXd x_min(STATE_SIZE), x_max(STATE_SIZE);
38  x_max.setConstant(std::numeric_limits<double>::max());
39  x_min.setConstant(std::numeric_limits<double>::min());
40  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue x_min_value, x_max_value;
41  if (nh_private.getParam("x_max", x_max_value)) {
42  ROS_ASSERT(x_max_value.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeArray);
43  ROS_ASSERT(x_max_value.size() == STATE_SIZE);
44  for (int i = 0; i < STATE_SIZE; i++) {
45  x_max(i) = static_cast<double>(x_max_value[i]);
46  }
47  }
48  if (nh_private.getParam("x_min", x_min_value)) {
49  ROS_ASSERT(x_min_value.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeArray);
50  ROS_ASSERT(x_min_value.size() == STATE_SIZE);
51  for (int i = 0; i < STATE_SIZE; i++) {
52  x_min(i) = static_cast<double>(x_min_value[i]);
53  }
54  } else {
55  // Default x_min value is -x_max
56  x_min = -x_max;
57  }
58 
59  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue sensors;
60  nh_private.getParam("sensors", sensors);
61  ROS_ASSERT(sensors.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeArray);
62 
63  for (int i = 0; i < sensors.size(); i++) {
64  // For some reason an empty array (I think) is contained in sensors,
65  // even when I dont see a reason why. To prevent issues with such
66  // things, skip all entries which are not structs/dicts
67  if (sensors[i].getType() != XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeStruct) {
68  continue;
69  }
70 
71  std::string type = sensors[i]["type"];
72  if (type == "sensor_msgs/NavSatFix") {
73  sensor_ptrs.push_back(new NavSatFixSensor(*this, sensors[i], nh));
74  } else if (type == "sensor_msgs/Imu") {
75  sensor_ptrs.push_back(new ImuSensor(*this, sensors[i], nh));
76  } else if (type == "twizy_wheel_encoder/WheelEncoder") {
77  sensor_ptrs.push_back(
78  new WheelencoderSensor(*this, sensors[i], nh));
79  } else {
80  ROS_WARN("Unknown sensor type %s",
81  static_cast<std::string>(type).c_str());
82  continue;
83  }
84  }
85 
86  std::string control_topic;
87  double wheelbase = 1.0;
88  double control_acceleration_gain = 1.0, max_control_acceleration = 1.0;
89  double control_angle_speed_gain = 1.0, max_control_angle_speed = 1.0;
90  if (nh_private.getParam("control_topic", control_topic)) {
91  nh_private.getParam("wheelbase", wheelbase);
92  nh_private.getParam("control_acceleration_gain",
93  control_acceleration_gain);
94  nh_private.getParam("max_control_acceleration",
95  max_control_acceleration);
96  nh_private.getParam("control_angle_speed_gain",
97  control_angle_speed_gain);
98  nh_private.getParam("max_control_angle_speed", max_control_angle_speed);
99  }
100 
101  nh_private.getParam("wheelbase", wheelbase);
102 
103  filter = std::unique_ptr<AckermannEkf>(
104  new AckermannEkf(x_min, x_max, wheelbase, control_acceleration_gain,
105  max_control_acceleration, control_angle_speed_gain,
106  max_control_angle_speed));
107  stable_filter = std::unique_ptr<AckermannEkf>(
108  new AckermannEkf(x_min, x_max, wheelbase, control_acceleration_gain,
109  max_control_acceleration, control_angle_speed_gain,
110  max_control_angle_speed));
111 
112  if (nh_private.hasParam("control_topic")) {
113  ROS_INFO("Subscribing to control signals on topic %s",
114  control_topic.c_str());
115 
116  control_subscriber_ = nh.subscribe(
117  control_topic, 10, &SensorArray::control_callback, this);
118  }
119 
120  odom_publisher_ = nh.advertise<nav_msgs::Odometry>("odom", 10);
121 
122  // Periodically call back to periodic_update
123  periodic_update_timer_ = nh.createTimer(
124  ros::Duration(1.0 / frequency_), &SensorArray::periodic_update, this);
125 }
126 
127 void SensorArray::control_callback(
128  const ackermann_msgs::AckermannDriveStamped::ConstPtr msg) {
129 
130  ControlSignal control_signal;
131  control_signal.u(ControlSignal::speed) = msg->drive.speed;
132  control_signal.u(ControlSignal::angle) = msg->drive.steering_angle;
133  control_signal.time = msg->header.stamp.toSec();
134 
135  filter->process_control_signal(control_signal);
136  stable_filter->process_control_signal(control_signal);
137 }
138 
139 void SensorArray::periodic_update(const ros::TimerEvent &evt) {
140  // If the callback called this function twise for the same timestamp, i.e.
141  // the current time is the same as the last time don't try and republish
142  // values for the same timestamp
143  if (evt.current_real == evt.last_real) {
144  return;
145  }
146 
147  // Force filter state forward so it doesn't get left behind if there are no
148  // measurement values
149  this->bring_time_forward_to(evt.current_real.toSec() -
150  periodic_filter_time_delay_);
151 
152  tf2::Quaternion q;
153  q.setRPY(filter->x(State::Roll), filter->x(State::Pitch),
154  filter->x(State::Yaw));
155 
156  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transformStamped;
157 
158  transformStamped.header.stamp = evt.current_real;
159  transformStamped.header.frame_id = world_frame_;
160  transformStamped.child_frame_id = base_link_;
161  transformStamped.transform.translation.x = filter->x(State::X);
162  transformStamped.transform.translation.y = filter->x(State::Y);
163  transformStamped.transform.translation.z = zero_z_ ? 0.0 : filter->x(State::Z);
164  transformStamped.transform.rotation.x = q.x();
165  transformStamped.transform.rotation.y = q.y();
166  transformStamped.transform.rotation.z = q.z();
167  transformStamped.transform.rotation.w = q.w();
168 
169  tf_broadcaster_->sendTransform(transformStamped);
170 
171  nav_msgs::Odometry odometry;
172  odometry.header.stamp = evt.current_real;
173  odometry.header.frame_id = world_frame_;
174  odometry.child_frame_id = base_link_;
175 
176  odometry.pose.pose.position.x = filter->x(State::X);
177  odometry.pose.pose.position.y = filter->x(State::Y);
178  odometry.pose.pose.position.z = zero_z_ ? 0.0 : filter->x(State::Z);
179  odometry.pose.pose.orientation.x = q.x();
180  odometry.pose.pose.orientation.y = q.y();
181  odometry.pose.pose.orientation.z = q.z();
182  odometry.pose.pose.orientation.w = q.w();
183 
184  const int XYZRPY[6] = {State::X, State::Y, State::Z,
185  State::Roll, State::Pitch, State::Yaw};
186  for (int i = 0; i < 36; i++) {
187  odometry.pose.covariance[i] = filter->P(XYZRPY[i / 6], XYZRPY[i % 6]);
188  }
189 
190  const double v = filter->x(State::speed), v2 = v * v;
191  const double Pv = filter->P(State::speed, State::speed);
192 
193  odometry.twist.twist.linear.x = filter->x(State::speed);
194  odometry.twist.twist.angular.x = filter->x(State::droll_dx) * v;
195  odometry.twist.twist.angular.y = filter->x(State::dpitch_dx) * v;
196  odometry.twist.twist.angular.z = filter->x(State::dyaw_dx) * v;
197 
198  // Math is hard... This covariance is just guessed and not rigorous in any
199  // way whatsoever: We e.g. use only set a diagonal covaraiance matrix
200  odometry.twist.covariance[0] = filter->P(State::speed, State::speed);
201  odometry.twist.covariance[7] = MIN_COVARIANCE;
202  odometry.twist.covariance[14] = MIN_COVARIANCE;
203  odometry.twist.covariance[21] =
204  filter->P(State::Roll, State::Roll) * v2 +
205  Pv * filter->x(State::Roll) * filter->x(State::Roll);
206  odometry.twist.covariance[28] =
207  filter->P(State::Pitch, State::Pitch) * v2 +
208  Pv * filter->x(State::Pitch) * filter->x(State::Pitch);
209  odometry.twist.covariance[35] =
210  filter->P(State::Yaw, State::Yaw) * v2 +
211  Pv * filter->x(State::Yaw) * filter->x(State::Yaw);
212 
213  odom_publisher_.publish(odometry);
214 }
215 
216 void SensorArray::process_measurement(Measurement &measurement) {
217  // If the initial position has not already been determined and the provided
218  // measurement contains the neccesary position data set the initial position
219  // equal to that
220  if (!filter_initialized_ &&
221  (measurement.mask[Measurement::X] && measurement.mask[Measurement::Y] &&
222  measurement.mask[Measurement::Z])) {
223  initial_position_(0) = measurement.z(Measurement::X);
224  initial_position_(1) = measurement.z(Measurement::Y);
225  initial_position_(2) = measurement.z(Measurement::Z);
226  // This subtraction is not neccessary, but is mostly so that the robot
227  // will start with height close to zeor (if the robot was upright when
228  // the measurement was taken)
229  initial_position_ -= measurement.sensor_position;
230 
231  // The filter is initialized as soon as initial_position_ has been set
232  filter_initialized_ = true;
233 
234  // The initial time of the filter is now, when the filtering has been
235  // initialized
236  filter->time = measurement.time;
237  stable_filter->time = measurement.time;
238  }
239 
240  if (filter_initialized_) {
241  // Subtract initial position
242  measurement.z(Measurement::X) -= initial_position_(0);
243  measurement.z(Measurement::Y) -= initial_position_(1);
244  measurement.z(Measurement::Z) -= initial_position_(2);
245  } else {
246  // Wait unitil filter_initialized_ before continuing
247  return;
248  }
249 
250  filter->process_measurement(measurement);
251  stable_filter->process_measurement(measurement);
252 }
253 
254 void SensorArray::process_unstable_measurement(Measurement &measurement) {
255  if (filter_initialized_) {
256  // Subtract initial position
257  measurement.z(Measurement::X) -= initial_position_(0);
258  measurement.z(Measurement::Y) -= initial_position_(1);
259  measurement.z(Measurement::Z) -= initial_position_(2);
260  } else {
261  // Wait unitil filter_initialized_ before continuing
262  return;
263  }
264 
265  filter->process_measurement(measurement);
266 }
267 
268 bool SensorArray::bring_time_forward_to(double time) {
269  // There is no point in bringing time forward if the filter has not been
270  // initialized and we have no idea what the state should be
271  if (filter_initialized_) {
272  filter->bring_time_forward_to(time);
273  stable_filter->bring_time_forward_to(time);
274  return true;
275  }
276  return false;
277 }
278 
279 bool SensorArray::get_transform(geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &transform,
280  const std_msgs::Header &header) {
281  try {
282  transform = tf_buffer_->lookupTransform(base_link_, header.frame_id,
283  ros::Time(0));
284  } catch (tf2::TransformException &ex) {
285  ROS_WARN("%s", ex.what());
286  return false;
287  }
288  return true;
289 }
290 
291 SensorArray::~SensorArray() {
292  filter.reset();
293  stable_filter.reset();
294 
295  tf_buffer_.reset();
296  tf_listener_.reset();
297  tf_broadcaster_.reset();
298 }
